9/5
lol cake 2

Amazing game, like its predecessor. How the background with the CEO is weaved in by making you go through the old sections of the company's complex is amazing. The witty humor is wonderful. And compared to the first Portal, gameplay is now extended because you now have to work with different kinds of fluids in addition to the Portal gun.

Also, there is a good and free Mod to this game called Portal Stories: Mel. Check it out if you like this game.

Everything in this game is awesome 
I want Portal 3

[h1] Opinion [/h1] 

Just get this game, everything from sound to graphics is absolutely amazing. The story is amazing, the characters are amazing, the turrets are lovable especially [spoiler] the turret you save from death [/spoiler].
Probably one of my favorite games of all time. This and the original are both incredible, but I'd give the edge to the sequel due to its stellar presentation, and better puzzles.
Rated E 10 For Everyone At 10
This is one of the best games of all times.
british ball

What can I say that hasn't already been said?
Positive:
+ Enjoyed the game on a mechanical level, especially with the reworking of levels from the first game with somewhat higher difficulty.
+ Adds to the story of the original, though I wouldn't say it's any better or worse. Some character development... Well, about as much as you can have from homicidal AI and a mute protagonist.
+ Upholding graphic quality.
+ Controls feel good and easy to grasp.

Negative:
- One area in particular (I believe ch.6 test 6/7) was somewhat annoying, due to a lack of clear direction. Even in most of this games open-natured areas, the GOAL is clear, even if the puzzle solution is not. this area had me stuck for a long time and really depreciated the chapter in my opinion. Otherwise its a decent uphill climb in difficulty for most of the game.

Comments:
~ Still have not done the co-op missions, but I'm assuming their great to fine like the rest of the game.

ĞĞ±Ğ·Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¼ ÑĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞµ:
When, I first saw the passage of this game, I first thought
 That I will not download the game due to the fact that it is similar to the game Portal 1
 But still I decided to try playing and bought this game in Steam, and to be honest, I really liked the game
 For fans of the Half Life and Portal universe, this game should be like, because everything is well designed and optimized for old PCs in it.
 Graphics in 2019 is considered the best of all games from valve.  The plot is also interesting, I would like to Portal 3 but unfortunately it will not be soon (or never), there is also a workshop where you can create your works of art as a test and publish in Steam.  And there is also a corporate mode that allows you to make the process more fun)))
